description:
Kariu Rena is http://anidb.net/ch79914 [Arata]`s classmate who sits next to him and is a volleyball club member. A girl who is very competitive, she wants to be the best at everything. She thinks of http://anidb.net/ch79913 [Chizuru] and http://anidb.net/ch81889 [Honoka] as her rivals, but is on good terms with them. Rena is stubborn and proud, but actually genuinely confused inside.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kariu Rena
